channel.title: Client can't connect to my server
channel.description: hey guys everytime someone dl's the clients i make when servers up they say it says error connecting to server yes i portforwarded and all that they have to use silab and even other clients they can't connect with..only a few clients work with it so i post that on my runelocus page..they dl...and it doesn't work!!why doesn't it connect?any help?

item.title: Client can't connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

xray veeo:

hey guys everytime someone dl’s the clients i make when servers up they say it says error connecting to server yes i portforwarded and all that they have to use silab and even other clients they can’t connect with…only a few clients work with it so i post that on my google page…they dl…and it doesn’t work!!why doesn’t it connect?any help?

well the server port might be 0.0.0.0? in client.java i think check it if it is then change to 43594?

Read full topic
item.source: Client can't connect to my server
